```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
#Step1 - download data file
url <- "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/wine-quality/winequality-red.csv"
download.file(url, destfile = "winequality-red.csv")
#Import into R
wine <- read.csv("winequality-red.csv", sep = ";")
head(wine)
```
```{r}
#Descriptive statistics - quantitative summary
summary(wine$alcohol)

#Descriptive statistics - categorical summary
summary(wine$quality)

```
```{r}
#Transform a variable
wine$log_sugar <- log(wine$residual.sugar + 1)
```
```{r}
#Plotting - histogram and scatterplot
hist(wine$alcohol, main = "Alcohol Content", xlab = "Alcohol", col = "red")

plot(wine$alcohol, wine$pH, main = "Alcohol vs Sugar", xlab = "Alcohol", ylab = "Residual.sugar", col = "blue")
```
